committee.name: HONORARY CHAIR
committee.message: Details will be updated soon. Stay tuned!

members.name: Dr. G Shobha
members.position: Professor and Dean, School of Computer Science and Engineering

committee.name: PROGRAM CHAIR

members.name: Dr. Merin Thomas
members.position: Assistant Dean - IQAC, Minors Specialisations, & General Electives PhD

roles: Oversee the planning and organization of the conference, ensuring all aspects align with the event's goals and theme.
Coordinate with keynote speakers, panelists, and session chairs to develop the conference program.
Manage logistics, including venue selection, scheduling, and resource allocation.
Facilitate communication and collaboration among committee members and stakeholders.
Address issues during the conference, ensuring smooth execution and attendee satisfaction.

committee.name: TECHNICAL PROGRAM CHAIR

members.name: Dr. Manish Kumar
members.position: Associate Professor, MCA, M.Phil (Computer Science), Post Graduate Diploma - Cyber Law, Ph.D (Computer Science)

roles: Review and evaluate submitted papers or presentations for technical accuracy and relevance
Develop the technical program schedule, including paper presentations, workshops, and panel discussions
Collaborate with reviewers to ensure high-quality feedback and adherence to submission guidelines
Ensure diversity and inclusion in the technical content by selecting a broad range of topics and speakers
Address technical questions or concerns from authors and attendees during the conference

committee.name: TECHNICAL PROGRAM MEMBER
committee.message: Details will be updated soon. Stay tuned!

committee.name: SPONSORSHIP CHAIR

members.name: Prof. Vaidyanathan Sivasubramanian
members.position: Professor of Practice, M.S. Software Systems and B.E. Computer Science & Engineering

members.name: Prof. Balu Masti
members.position: Adjunct Professor, School of Computer Science and Engineering, MS in CSE, University of Nebraska-Lincoln, USA

members.name: Prof. Chandramouleeswaran Sankaran
members.position: Professor. B.E in Electronic and Communications from Thiagarajar College of Engineering, Madurai. MTech in Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Madras

members.name: Prof. CVSN Reddy
members.position: Professor, School of Computer Science and Engineering at RV University. Associate Professor of Computer Science at Hewlett Packard Enterprise

roles: Identify and approach potential sponsors aligned with the conference's theme and goals
Develop sponsorship packages and benefits to attract various levels of sponsorship
Negotiate sponsorship agreements and ensure deliverables are met for both parties
Maintain communication with sponsors, providing updates and addressing their needs
Ensure sponsor visibility and recognition during the conference through branding, booths, and acknowledgments

committee.name: PUBLICITY AND MEDIA CHAIR

members.name: Prof. Chakravarthula S K Raju
members.position: Assistant Professor, MSc(Applied Mathematics), Ph.D., Post Doc(Hanyang University, South Korea)

roles: Develop and execute a comprehensive publicity plan to promote the conference
Manage social media channels, email campaigns, and the conference website for announcements and updates
Collaborate with media outlets to secure coverage and press releases for the event
Design promotional materials, such as flyers, brochures, and digital content
Monitor and analyze the effectiveness of publicity efforts to optimize engagement

committee.name: WEB SITE AND EASYCHAIR CHAIRS

members.name: Prof. Sheba Pari N
members.position: Assistant Professor, BE, MTech, pursuing PhD

roles: Design, develop, and maintain the conference website, ensuring it is user-friendly and up-to-date
Manage the EasyChair platform for paper submissions, reviews, and author communication
Ensure seamless integration between the website and EasyChair for registration, schedules, and updates
Address technical issues related to the website and EasyChair platform promptly
Provide authors, reviewers, and participants with clear guidance and support on using the platforms

committee.name: FINANCE COMMITTEE

members.name: Prof. Muralidhar Billa
members.position: Assistant Professor, BE, Masters in Information systems (Australia), MTech in DataScience, Pursuing PhD

members.name: Prof. Kalpana Devi S
members.position: Assistant Professor, BE, MTech, Pursuing PhD

roles: Handle all financial transactions, sponsorship funds, and vendor payments
Monitor and track expenses to ensure alignment with the approved budget
Prepare financial reports and statements for the organizing committee and stakeholders
Ensure compliance with financial regulations and manage any associated tax or legal requirements

committee.name: REGISTRATION COMMITTEE

members.name: Prof. Shanti Konda
members.position: Assistant Professor, Btech - Bioinformatics(AU), Mtech - Data Science

roles: Set up and manage the online and on-site registration process for participants
Maintain an accurate database of registered attendees and provide confirmation details
Prepare and distribute registration materials, such as badges, tickets, and conference kits
Address participant inquiries and resolve issues related to registration
Ensure smooth check-in procedures during the conference to avoid delays or confusion

committee.name: SESSION MANAGEMENT

members.name: Prof. Muralidhar Billa
members.position: Assistant Professor, BE, Masters in Information systems(Australia), MTech in DataScience, Pursuing PhD

roles: Coordinate and schedule conference sessions, ensuring they align with the program agenda
Assign session chairs and provide them with guidelines for managing their respective sessions
Ensure all technical requirements, such as AV equipment and presentation tools, are set up and functional
Manage session timings to ensure adherence to the schedule and smooth transitions between presentations
Address any issues or disruptions during sessions to maintain a professional and engaging environment

committee.name: HOSPITALITY COMMITTEE

members.name: Prof. Amruthesh Bhat
members.position: Assistant Professor, MSc Applied Physics, Specialization in Solid state Physics

roles: Organize accommodations and travel arrangements for keynote speakers, panelists, and VIP attendees
Plan and oversee catering services, including meals, refreshments, and dietary preferences
Arrange welcome kits, conference materials, and souvenirs for participants
Set up help desks or information counters to assist attendees with inquiries during the event
Ensure a warm and welcoming environment, addressing any attendee needs or concerns promptly

committee.name: TRANSPORTATION COMMITTEE

members.name: Prof. Harish K R
members.position: Assistant Professor, MTech in Manufacturing Science and Engineering

members.name: Prof. Madugundu Chiranjeevi
members.position: Assistant Professor, Masters of Computer Applications, Specialization in Storage and Cloud Technology

roles: Organize accommodations and travel arrangements for keynote speakers, panelists, and VIP attendees
Plan and oversee catering services, including meals, refreshments, and dietary preferences
Arrange welcome kits, conference materials, and souvenirs for participants
Set up help desks or information counters to assist attendees with inquiries during the event
Ensure a warm and welcoming environment, addressing any attendee needs or concerns promptly
